name: Project Ghost Girl
description:
• What is Project Ghost Girl
    • Welcome to Project Ghost Girl! This is a simple character demo created for 2022 GDKO Round 1. In this demo you will play as the 'Ghost Girl' with her physics based ability: the 'Ghost Arm'
    • With the Ghost Arm, you can grab and throw boxes, and pull yourself towards platforms
  • How To Run Project Ghost Girl
    • Extract the zip file and run the GDKO Round 1 executable
  • Controls
    • A and D to move left and right
    • Mouse to move the ghost arm
    • Left mouse click to grab platforms or boxes
    • Release Left mouse to release platforms or throw boxes
  • Feedback
    • Feel free to leave 100% honest feedback! It's much appreciated
